name: exchangeable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving the act of giving something to someone and them giving you something else: Goods are exchangeable as long as they are returned in good condition.exchangeable for They gave us tokens which were exchangeable for food. See
exchange
More examplesFewer examplesThe company is developing exchangeable batteries for electric cars.The credits are exchangeable for a wide range of goods and services.Parents receive vouchers that are exchangeable for their children’s school tuition.

FINANCE able to be exchanged by its owner for something else: exchangeable for sth The bonds will be exchangeable for shares or cash.exchangeable into sth Drachma continued to be exchangeable into Euros until 2004. exchangeable bonds/shares/securities
